alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Jerauld (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 11:02AM MST until December 14 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph on Wednesday night and Thursday morning. * WHERE...Beadle and Jerauld Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 AM Wednesday to noon CST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility Wednesday night and Thursday morning. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected on Wednesday and Wednesday night. Winds will be increasing Wednesday night and continue into Thursday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
